message.name: WARN_DEFAULT_EVIDENCE_TYPE_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE
message.locale: Warning Message: The default evidence type code %1s, is not available for the case type being processed. Therefore a randomly select evidence type will be set as the default cover in the Evidence Flow.

message.name: WARN_EVIDENCE_COVER_DELAY_TOO_HIGH
message.locale: Warning Message: The configured evidence cover delay (%1n) exceeds the recommended maximum value (%2n).

message.name: WARN_EVIDENCE_POLLING_INTERVAL_TOO_HIGH
message.locale: Warning Message: The configured evidence polling interval (%1n) exceeds the recommended maximum value (%2n).
